title: Kalista needs a buff
body: {{champion:429}}  now is one of the worst ADC nobody can play with her and her e dmg is so low .. she need's a buff to start play again with her ...

replies.body:
IMO she needs some big buffs to some areas of her kit, but others will need to be weakened a ton to compensate.

She's just kinda split in style.  Her passive gives her great survivability on her own, but her W passive and ult heavily encourage staying with your support at all times.

Kalista does not need compensation nerfs to go with major buffs, there's a reason the term "x champion is getting kalista'd" exists.

She has been driven into the ground repeatedly with so many nerfs that it would take an extreme amount of nerf reverts to make her viable again.
